1370: Hetselo moved to Breestraat.A.12 after marriage.
Got married to Clementia at age 29 in 1370.
1372: Had a daughter with Clementia, Clementia, at age 31.
1373: Had a son with Clementia, Assceric, at age 32.
1374: Had a son with Clementia, Siabbo, at age 33.
1375: Had a daughter with Clementia, Wendelmodis, at age 34.
1376: Had a son with Clementia, Heinkin, at age 35.
1377: Lost son Heinkin when Heinkin was 2 years old.
1379: Had a son with Clementia, Seukinus, at age 38.
1380: Had a daughter with Clementia, Nimme, at age 39.
1381: Had a daughter with Clementia, Meynseth, at age 40.
1382: Lost son Seukinus when Seukinus was 4 years old.
Lost daughter Meynseth when Meynseth was 2 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1383: Had a son with Clementia, Walramus, at age 42.
